description: This file defines a Data Transfer Object (DTO) class 'RoomDTO' representing room-related information, including attributes like room code, name, active status, creation timestamp, and list of players.

classes.name: RoomDTO
classes.description: A DTO class encapsulating details of a game room for client-side consumption, including room identification, status, creation time, and participating players.

methods.name: getRoomCode
methods.description: Returns the unique code identifying the room.

methods.name: setRoomCode
methods.description: Sets the room code and returns the current instance for chaining.

methods.name: getName
methods.description: Returns the name of the room.

methods.name: setName
methods.description: Sets the room name and returns the current instance for chaining.

methods.name: isActive
methods.description: Returns whether the room is active.

methods.name: setActive
methods.description: Sets the room's active status and returns the current instance for chaining.

methods.name: getCreatedAt
methods.description: Returns the timestamp when the room was created.

methods.name: setCreatedAt
methods.description: Sets the creation timestamp and returns the current instance for chaining.

methods.name: getPlayers
methods.description: Returns the list of players currently in the room.

methods.name: setPlayers
methods.description: Sets the list of players in the room and returns the current instance for chaining.
